data.text: @ryanburge @phil_zuckerman Seropositivity only last about 3 months after a Covid Infection. T-memory cell positivity is the real test of those who has ever had Covid. This chart is meaningless.  Evolutionary Biologist, Evangelical and fully vaccinated.

@ryanburge Appreciate the disclaimer. Also important to avoid the ecological fallacy. 

I ran this with the recent BRS at the individual level. I am very wary of self reporting, but found it interesting that when controlling for COVID skepticism, thereâ€™s no relationship. Reverses with CNat!
@ryanburge Aren't white Evangelicals also the least vaccinated group?  Or near the least?
@ryanburge Who cares about a spurious correlation. Old news
